original_text:
Thorns shall grow over its strongholds,
    nettles and thistles in its fortresses.
It shall be the haunt of jackals,
    an abode for ostriches.
korean_text: 그 궁궐에는 가시나무가 나며 그 견고한 성에는 엉겅퀴와 새품이 자라서 승냥이의 굴과 타조의 처소가 될 것이니

sentences.original_text: Thorns shall grow over its strongholds
nettles and thistles in its fortresses
It shall be the haunt of jackals
